item.description:
I truly believe the name of this meetup says it all! Come see this fun classic with your friends.
http://www.cheshireli...

Before the movie, let's meet at the Main Street Cafe for dinner or coffee. I will be there at 6:00 p.m. They have great food! But, they close at 9:00 p.m., so going there afterward would be kind of rushed. The film is 1 hr., 31 min. If you can't make it to the cafe, meet us at the library!

Main Street Cafe
209 West Main Street, Cheshire, CT 06410-2412
(203) 439-9434‎

(Formerly "Greenwich Coffee." It is right at the intersection of Rt.68/70 and Maple Ave. It is next to a corner Getty gas station.)
item.name: 'Monty Python and the Holy Grail' FREE at the Cheshire Library!
